mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.* FROM ( SELECT SUM(O.order_amount) scrapCarTotalAmount,COUNT(1) scrapCarTotalCount FROM car_scrap_order O WHERE O.isremove = 0 AND O.order_type = '1' AND O.order_status = 7 AND O.client_id = #{clientId} ) A, ( SELECT SUM(amount) partTotalAmount,COUNT(1) partTotalCount FROM car_scrap_order_autoparts AA JOIN car_scrap_order O ON AA.order_id=O.id AND AA.order_autoparts_status = 8 AND O.isremove = 0 AND O.order_type = '2' AND O.order_status = 8 AND O.client_id = #{clientId} ) B

SELECT O.id, O.order_time orderTime, O.order_type orderType, case O.order_type when '1' then '整车回收' else '旧件回收' end as orderTypeS, case O.order_type when '1' then O.order_amount else (select sum(AA.amount) from car_scrap_order_autoparts AA where AA.order_id=O.id AND AA.order_autoparts_status = 8) end as orderAmount, O.car_number carNumber, case O.order_type when '1' then 0 else (select count(1) from car_scrap_order_autoparts AA where AA.order_id=O.id AND AA.order_autoparts_status = 8) end as partsNum FROM car_scrap_order O WHERE O.isremove = 0 AND ((O.order_type = '1' and O.order_status = 7) or (O.order_type = '2' and O.order_status = 8)) AND O.client_id = #{clientId}
